message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: Questions for the negotiation

probable starting date (Jan 1?)
flexibility in changing the visit plan (during negotiation / later), provided the number of PMs and balance is not altered
whether EU partners manage the money for their outgoing AND incoming visits.
What to do with the change in funding proposed by the Commission. Where to cut?
What happens if somebody stops working in a partner and is named in the annex I?
Will it be possible to report annualy istead of every two years? If Yes, will be the payment delivered by the EC every year, after receiving the financial statements (Form C)?
speaker: SYSTEM
